string.name: maturity_label_alpha
string.tomtom:desc: App release level. Alpha level means the app may be unstable and is not yet finished

string.name: maturity_label_beta
string.tomtom:desc: App release level. Beta level means the app is technically ready but there may be more known/unknown bugs

string.name: frw_title_waiting_for_permissions
string.tomtom:desc: Informs the user that the app is waiting until permission is granted

string.name: frw_title_waiting_for_position
string.tomtom:desc: Informs the user that the app is waiting for geographical position

string.name: frw_title_skip
string.tomtom:desc: Info to user about geographical regions

resources.string: The location permission is required for the application to function.\n Please grant the location permission.
Determining your location…\nIf it takes long and you're indoors, change location to improve GPS reception

Some offline map content relevant to your current location is going to be installed.
 This might use up to 1 GB, depending on your surroundings.
 
 Mobile data costs
 Please make sure your device has wifi turned on for this setup to avoid mobile data expenses.
 
 Tap Continue to start installing relevant map content.

An error occurred while downloading and installing map content.
 Make sure this device has a working internet connection.
 
 Error: %1$s
 
 Try to install regions using manual map management (switch on Enable Map Management setting first).
Without installing map-regions, your onboard map will be empty.

string.name: frw_button_open_settings
string.tomtom:desc: Open setting prompt on the button

resources.string: Internet connection is not available. Make sure this device has a working internet connection.

string.name: user_consent_title_ask_for_consent
string.tomtom:desc: Title of the privacy consent screen

resources.string: We need to know your location to show traffic information on your route.\nBy tapping 'Accept' you give consent to share your location, journey and usage data to improve this app.
